change.description: Change order of meteg and etnachta, add CGJ to make display robust.
change.refuni: tav dagesh rafe hiriq nun sheva alef qamats meteg etnachta final-pe sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: tav dagesh rafe hiriq nun sheva alef qamats etnachta cgj meteg final-pe sof-pasuq

notes.note: The etnacha is out-of-line relative to the other accents on the aleph. Its position is correct in reading from right to left, however.

change.description: In the LC the marks on the aleph are out of order, add a note c.
change.refuni: tav dagesh rafe hiriq nun sheva alef qamats meteg etnachta final-pe sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: tav dagesh rafe hiriq nun sheva alef qamats meteg etnachta final-pe sof-pasuq

notes.note: The upper cantillation marks on the aleph should end in a siluq, not an etnachta.
No change in text, add a note c.

change.description: Change qamats to patah, change note 'n' to 't'.

lc.credit: Photo by author, cropped by publisher.

change.refuni: kaf dagesh qamats resh sheva mem hiriq merkha yod
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh patah resh sheva mem hiriq merkha yod

notes.note: The qamats on the kaf is generally accepted as anomalous; hence the transcription note 'n'.

The reference text is based on a black/white facsimile of the LC. In the black/white facsimile Beck & Freedman, the dot in the qamats is dark and well-shaped. The color facsimile provided by the author (shown here) shows the dot is brown and possibly an artifact.
If the dot does not represent scribal intent, the qamats becomes a patah, and the word is no longer anomalous.
Note: The dot is to the left of the center of the patah bar.
The note will be changed to t, "Transcription uncertain".

date.title: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed

summary.note: The shape of the zarqa in the LC is best represented in the Ezra SIL font.

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere zarqa lamed
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere lamed zarqa

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere zarqa lamed
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere lamed zarqa

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere zarqa lamed
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere lamed zarqa

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva tsadi patah lamed sheva alef tsere zarqa lamed
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva tsadi patah lamed sheva alef tsere lamed zarqa

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere zarqa lamed
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere lamed zarqa

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere zarqa lamed
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere lamed zarqa

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere zarqa lamed
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere lamed zarqa

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: tav vav dagesh kaf patah zarqa lamed
change.changeuni: tav vav dagesh kaf patah lamed zarqa

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere zarqa lamed
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere lamed zarqa

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere zarqa lamed
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere lamed zarqa

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere zarqa lamed
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere lamed zarqa

date.title: Add note 'c' because of multiple accents on word

change.description: Add note 'c' because of multiple accents on word.

lc.credit: Credit: Photograph by Bruce and Kenneth Zuckerman, West Semitic Research, in collaboration with Ancient Biblical Manuscript Center. Courtesy National Library of Russia (Saltykov-Shchedrin).

change.refuni: zayin segol gereshayim telisha-gedola he
change.changeuni: zayin segol gereshayim telisha-gedola he

notes.note: The gereshayim and telisha-gedola is unusual, but not impossible.

change.description: Change note 'n' to note 'c' because of multiple accents on word.

lc.credit: Credit: Photograph by Bruce and Kenneth Zuckerman, West Semitic Research, in collaboration with Ancient Biblical Manuscript Center. Courtesy National Library of Russia (Saltykov-Shchedrin).

change.refuni: nun dagesh holam alef kaf patah mahapakh tipeha lamed
change.changeuni: nun dagesh holam alef kaf patah mahapakh tipeha lamed

notes.note: Two markings on this word are a peculiarity of the Leningrad Codex.

The mahapakh doesn't make sense as an alternative to the tipeha. There is no tradition of what a combined mahapakh-tipeha would mean. There is no tradition of a specialized presentation of alternatives as in the Decalogues/Reuven Saga.
Adding a note c.

change.description: Add note 'c' because of multiple accents on word.
change.refuni: zayin holam gereshayim telisha-gedola alef tav
change.changeuni: zayin holam gereshayim telisha-gedola alef tav

notes.note: The gereshayim and telisha-gedola is unusual, but not impossible.

change.description: Remove dagesh from resh, add note 't'.

lc.credit: Credit: Photograph by Bruce and Kenneth Zuckerman, West Semitic Research, in collaboration with Ancient Biblical Manuscript Center. Courtesy National Library of Russia (Saltykov-Shchedrin).

change.refuni: vav sheva nun qamats he qamats resh dagesh pashta
change.changeuni: vav sheva nun qamats he qamats resh pashta

notes.note: The dagesh in the resh is unexpected.

The reference text is based on a black/white facsimile of the LC. In the black/white facsimile the dot in the resh is dark and slightly irregular. The color facsimile, above, the dot is brown with an attached, smaller, darker dash. The dagesh is probably an artifact.
Note: The color page has a scattering of similar brown dots, such as ones above the nun in the word.
Note: Masora Circle over the word refers to the number '4' in the left margin.

change.description: Remove mappiq/dagesh from he, add note 't'.

lc.credit: Credit: Photograph by Bruce and Kenneth Zuckerman, West Semitic Research, in collaboration with Ancient Biblical Manuscript Center. Courtesy National Library of Russia (Saltykov-Shchedrin).

change.refuni: het hataf-patah mem holam resh tsere yod he dagesh segol etnachta final-mem
change.changeuni: het hataf-patah mem holam resh tsere yod he segol etnachta final-mem

notes.note: The mappiq/dagesh in the he is unexpected grammatically and dubious in the LC.

The reference text is based on a black/white facsimile of the LC. In the black/white facsimile the dot in the he is dark and regular. The color facsimile, above, the dot is brown and somewhat larger than normal. The mappiq/dagesh is probably an artifact.

The author credits this observation to Prof. Avraham Tal of Tel Aviv University. Ben Denckla notes that the correction is also in Viktor Golinets, "Dages, Mappiq, Specks on Vellum, and Editing of the Codex Leningradensis", KUSATU 15/2013, p. 250 (2013).

change.description: Add hiriq to het, add note 't'.

lc.credit: Credit: Photograph by Bruce and Kenneth Zuckerman, West Semitic Research, in collaboration with Ancient Biblical Manuscript Center. Courtesy National Library of Russia (Saltykov-Shchedrin).

change.refuni: het kaf dagesh tipeha vav holam
change.changeuni: het hiriq kaf dagesh tipeha vav holam

notes.note: The het lacks any vowel. A slight hint of a hireq is visible.
The JPS Tanakh (1999) has a hiriq on the het.

date.title: Changes from WLCU 4.22 (unofficial) provided by the Groves Center.

change.description: Change zaqef-qatan to revia on dalet.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh segol zaqef-qatan shin shin-dot segol alef
change.changeuni: dalet dagesh segol revia shin shin-dot segol alef

notes.note: The previous zaqef-qatan mark belongs to the word "elohim" on the preceding line, not this word. The revia is a smudge at the top end of the dalet.

change.description: Add dagesh to bet, add note 't'.
change.refuni: bet sheva ayin tsere tipeha dalet segol final-nun
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva ayin tsere tipeha dalet segol final-nun

notes.note: The image also shows the preceding word, גַּן־ . Note the size and color of the dagesh in the preceding word's gimel.
This is a very small dot.

change.description: Split word at maqaf.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh sheva dalet qamats resh lamed qamats ayin holam zaqef-qatan mem segol resh
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva dalet qamats resh maqaf lamed qamats ayin holam zaqef-qatan mem segol resh

notes.note: A connection between the resh and lamed is short, but thick.

change.description: Remove dagesh from tsadi.
change.refuni: kaf patah tsadi dagesh patah dalet dagesh hiriq tipeha yod qof
change.changeuni: kaf patah tsadi patah dalet dagesh hiriq tipeha yod qof

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq tav dagesh tsere tipeha final-nun
change.changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq tav dagesh tsere tipeha final-nun

change.description: Remove sheva from bet.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva nun vav holam pashta
change.changeuni: bet dagesh nun vav holam pashta

change.description: Remove dagesh from mem, add note 't'.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah bet hiriq yod mem dagesh segol merkha lamed segol final-kaf sheva
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah bet hiriq yod mem segol merkha lamed segol final-kaf sheva

notes.note: The dagesh is well-centered but of a different color.

change.description: Add revia to bet.
change.refuni: resh sheva alef vav dagesh bet tsere zaqef-qatan final-nun
change.changeuni: resh sheva alef vav dagesh bet tsere zaqef-qatan revia final-nun

notes.note: This word is part of the Reuven Saga which is known to have double accents.

change.description: Change hireq to sheva on nun.
change.refuni: bet sheva nun hiriq zaqef-qatan yod
change.changeuni: bet sheva nun sheva zaqef-qatan yod

change.description: Move revia from samekh to following he.
change.refuni: he patah samekh dagesh holam revia he patah resh
change.changeuni: he patah samekh dagesh holam he patah revia resh

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: he patah meteg shin shin-dot dagesh hiriq bet dagesh hataf-qamats lamed hiriq zaqef-qatan yod final-mem
change.changeuni: he patah meteg shin shin-dot hiriq bet dagesh hataf-qamats lamed hiriq zaqef-qatan yod final-mem

change.description: Change qamatz to patah on he.
change.refuni: he qamats shin shin-dot hiriq bet dagesh hataf-qamats lamed hiriq munah yod final-mem
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot hiriq bet dagesh hataf-qamats lamed hiriq munah yod final-mem

notes.note: The dot in the qamats is reddish and slightly larger than expected.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq pe dagesh holam merkha lamed
change.changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq pe dagesh holam merkha lamed

change.description: Add maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: resh merkha vav dagesh het patah
change.changeuni: resh merkha vav dagesh het patah maqaf

change.description: Change patah to segol on gimel.
change.refuni: he patah nun dagesh segol pashta gimel patah ayin pashta
change.changeuni: he patah nun dagesh segol pashta gimel segol ayin pashta

notes.note: This is the third of four in the verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: yod dagesh sheva he vav qamats etnachta he
change.changeuni: yod sheva he vav qamats etnachta he

notes.note: Dagesh is reddish and placed lower than usual.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: he qamats shin shin-dot dagesh patah mem dagesh qamats tipeha he
change.changeuni: he qamats shin shin-dot patah mem dagesh qamats tipeha he

change.description: Change revia to zaqef qatan on shin.
change.refuni: mem holam shin shin-dot segol revia he
change.changeuni: mem holam shin shin-dot segol zaqef-qatan he

change.description: Add paseq (and space) to end of word.
change.refuni: ayin hataf-patah lamed tsere yod he segol qadma final-nun
change.changeuni: ayin hataf-patah lamed tsere yod he segol qadma final-nun space paseq

notes.note: The paseq is small, but distinct.

change.description: Remove dagesh from lamed.
change.refuni: mem hiriq lamed dagesh hiriq bet dagesh hiriq etnachta yod
change.changeuni: mem hiriq lamed hiriq bet dagesh hiriq etnachta yod

change.description: Remove dagesh from final vav, add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh mem hiriq shin shin-dot dagesh qamats mem sheva resh mahapakh vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav dagesh mem hiriq shin shin-dot dagesh qamats mem sheva resh mahapakh vav

notes.note: The dagesh in the final vav is faint in contrast with the dagesh in the initial vav. The quality of the text is poor in this region, however.

change.description: Change patah to hataf-patah on ayin.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh patah ayin patah bet sheva dalet qubuts etnachta final-mem
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh patah ayin hataf-patah bet sheva dalet qubuts etnachta final-mem

change.description: Remove dagesh from final he.
change.refuni: vav dagesh mem hiriq mem dagesh patah munah ayin hataf-patah resh qamats bet qamats zaqef-qatan he dagesh
change.changeuni: vav dagesh mem hiriq mem dagesh patah munah ayin hataf-patah resh qamats bet qamats zaqef-qatan he

notes.note: The he has a rafe. Text is in bad shape.

change.description: Remove pashta from final he.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah nun vav dagesh shin shin-dot qamats etnachta he pashta
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah nun vav dagesh shin shin-dot qamats etnachta he

change.description: Remove pashta from final resh.
change.refuni: vav dagesh bet patah dalet dagesh qamats etnachta bet segol resh pashta
change.changeuni: vav dagesh bet patah dalet dagesh qamats etnachta bet segol resh

change.description: Change zaqef qatan on pe to revia, add note 't'.
change.refuni: nun holam pe tsere zaqef-qatan lamed
change.changeuni: nun holam pe tsere revia lamed

notes.note: Two dots over the pe might be taken as revias. One is almost touching the top of the pe, the other is above thge gap between the pe and the lamed. The revia on top of the pe is small and faint. Compare with the revias in 7:7.10 immediately above it or in the same verse at 7:8.24. It's very difficult to decide the correct accent.
The upper dot of the zaqaf qatan might be considered hidden by the munah in 7:7.6 immediately above it. The JPS Tanakh has a zaqef qatan.
The sefaria.org "Miqra_according_to_the_Masora" shows a revia instead of a zaqef qatan.

change.description: Change the etnachta on the yod to a mahapakh.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh qamats etnachta nun qamats samekh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh qamats makhapakh nun qamats samekh

change.description: Create a qere/ketiv pair.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah resh patah munah ayin alef
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah resh patah munah ayin alef

notes.note: The division into qere and ketiv, given below, also agrees with Sefaria's "Miqra according to the Masorah".

change.description: Remove dagesh from final he, change note from 'c' to 't'.
change.refuni: lamed sheva he patah munah ayin hataf-patah tsadi hiriq bet qamats zaqef-qatan he dagesh rafe
change.changeuni: lamed sheva he patah munah ayin hataf-patah tsadi hiriq bet qamats zaqef-qatan he rafe

notes.note: This change undos the change in 2020.10.19 - Changes.xml, 2020.07.16-1, which was based on a low resolution, black and white image of the text.
The high resolution, color image of the page shows that the dagesh is light, redish, and likely to be an artifact.
The lack of a dagesh on the consonant with a rafe agrees with usual Masoretic practice.
